title: Various Artists - Latino Blue / Blue Note Jazz
description:
Various Artists Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Latino Blue, 2000

Blue Note Jazz Con Sabor Latino



Latino Blue is a superb collection of Latin jazz spanning the mid '50s to the late '60s. 
The producer decided to reissue highlights from some of the rarer Cubop sessions that lie in the vaults of Blue Note's parent label, Capitol - from such labels as World Pacific, Roulette, Pacific Jazz, Roost, Jubilee.
As a result, listeners are treated to excellent rare material from Willie Bobo ("Trinidad," from his 1964 LP Let's Go Bobo! on Roulette), Joe Torres ("Soul Cha, La Bruja Negra" from a 1968 LP for World Pacific), the Jazz Crusaders ("Agua Dulce" from 1965's Chile Con Soul), Candido ("Long Long Summer, Toccata" with arrangements by Lalo Schifrin), and Art Blakey with conga maestro Sabu Martines ("Sakeena," from 1957's Cubop). 
For collectors and long-time fans, it's a bonanza of classic material.  



CD / Blue Note / 2000 / 320Kbps


Tracklist:
1. Latin Fever - Jack Costanzo 
2. Trinidad - Willie Bobo 
3. Congo Mulence - Machito & His Orchestra 
4. Soul Cha - Joe Torres 
5. Agua Dulce - The Jazz Crusaders 
6. African Fantasy - Bobby Montez 
7. Afrodisia - Kenny Dorham 
8. Long Long Summer - Candido 
9. Blue Sands - Charles Kynard & Buddy Collette 
10. Favela - Clare Fischer 
11. La Bruja Negra - Joe Torres 
12. Toccata - Candido 
13. Ritmo Bobo - Sonny Stitt 
14. Sakeena - Art Blakely 


Recorded between 1955 and 1968.
